alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Marshall (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 3:17PM CDT until August 07 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Marshall County in northeastern Alabama... Southern DeKalb County in northeastern Alabama... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 316 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Geraldine, or 11 miles northeast of Boaz, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albertville, Fort Payne, Boaz, Rainsville, Crossville, Fyffe, Geraldine, Pine Ridge, Lakeview and Little River Canyon NP. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
